verbs.description: [V: paying] [ARGM-MNR: while innocent is kentucky wrongly charging inmates before they ’re found guilty] i do n’t understand what authority jailers have to take any money for housing a prisoner if not found guilty said former kentucky senate president david williams a republican who helped shape state law constitutional rights senate jefferson county kentucky david jones oldham county kentucky david williams kentucky general assembly greg belzley wdrb news
